meanings.definition: A mark used to align or match two pieces together.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used matchmarks to make sure the shelves lined up perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The matchmarks on the blueprint helped the builders assemble the furniture correctly.
meanings.sent3: The matchmarks on the puzzle pieces made it easier for the child to put them together.
meanings.sent4: The matchmarks on the map guided the explorer through the maze-like forest.
meanings.sent5: The matchmarks on the road indicated where the two lanes merged into one.

meanings.definition: Marks on a surface indicating where two pieces should be joined.
meanings.sent1: The matchmarks on the wood showed where the boards needed to be connected.
meanings.sent2: The matchmarks on the fabric helped the tailor sew the pieces together accurately.
meanings.sent3: The matchmarks on the cake showed where the layers should be stacked.
meanings.sent4: The matchmarks on the paper guided the artist in aligning the edges perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The matchmarks on the puzzle pieces helped the player fit them together seamlessly.
